resources.string: Welcome Friend! \n\n Get ready to embark on a thrilling journey filled with excitement, and suspense.

Aim Of The Game! 

 The game starts with a number that decreases when clicked, this is known as the countdown number. 

 However, every third turn increases the drinking counter! If the countdown number reaches zero, the losing player has to drink the total amount shown on the drinking counter.
Create Your Players! \n\n Before we begin, we have to create your character! You can either take a photo of yourself, or if you\'re having a bad hair day, you can draw your character.
Choose your class! \n\n On top of creating your player, you can choose a class which grants you a perk in the game. This can range from skipping your turn, to making quizzes easier.
Choose A Starting Number! \n\n The aim of the game is not to get to 0. Tip ~ The lower the number, the faster the game!
Settings! \n\n Within the settings you will find options to disable different wildcards, make the quiz multi-choice or verbal answers, change the max losing drinking number, and so on.
Generate Button! \n\n Let me introduce you to the two main buttons. First, there\'s the \'Generate\' button, which will randomly choose a number between 0 and the number on screen.
Wildcard Button! \n\n This button throws tasks, quizzes, and challenges your way. Fail or skip them, and you\'ll have to take a drink. If you succeed, you can make someone else drink.
Wildcard Choices: Quizzes! \n\n If you get a quiz, and get the right answer, your turn is skipped, you get to keep your wildcard, and you can hand out a drink.
Wildcard Choices: Tasks! \n\n This category will provide you with something to do. It might be an impersontation, or it might be a drink. Who knows really!
Wildcard Choices: Truths! \n\n Like truth or dare, but bewarned, some of these are quite challenging!
Wildcard Choices: Extras! \n\n These wildcards change the game. For example, it might grant you more wildcards, or it might reset the number back to the starting number.
The End! \n\n Once a player hits that dreaded zero, they\'re the loser and must face the consequence of drinking the amount on the counter!

Hurray! \n\n You\'ve completed a round of High To Low! If the thrill of the game hasn\'t quenched your thirst for excitement, why not play it again, and again, and again. Literally do whatever you want, you\'re a free person so live your gorgeous life.
Tips And Tricks! \n\n You can also change the wildcards and edit them/add more.
Thank you! \n\n I hope you enjoy our game!
